biography: Tommy, a familiar face from Espoo Ringside Golf, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. While some might find his pre-shot routine a tad protracted, his focus is undeniable.
Tommy has participated in the Hector Trophée on two prior occasions. He is still seeking his first victory at the event, and will participate in Hector Trophée 2025.

Tommy's dedication to improvement is evident. He often spends countless hours on the practice greens, honing his putting stroke until dusk. He will participate in Hector Trophée 2025, which will be his third appearance.
